name: Event Horizon (itch) (jeebs)
description:
A short game made for Wowie 3.0 game jam. Everything was made during the jam except for the music and sounds. This is more like an experimental prototype rather than a game so there's not much to do, but I may develop it in the future.

controls: A S W D or arrows for movement. E for interacting. Esc to leave the game.

Hope you like it. and hope to hear some feedback!

download files below if you want to enjoy a better visual quality game.
